Listen contributors
-----------------

- Alec Mitchell (apm13@columbia.edu) 
    whose work was generously funded by The Open Planning Project
    http://www.openplans.org

- Rob Miller (robm@openplans.org)

- Rob Marianski (rmarianski@openplans.org)

- Chris Abraham (cabraham@openplans.org)

- Jeff Hammel (jhammel@openplans.org)

- Nicholas Bergson-Shilcock (nicholasbs@openplans.org)


Thank you
---------

Maik Jablonski for MailBoxer which performs the important mail related
tasks that this product acts as a front end for

The PloneMailBoxer team for some inspiration and an icon.

The Five team for bringing some of the elegance of zope 3 to the masses

Plone developers everywhere for obvious reasons

Dieter Maurer for ManagableIndex

Whit Morriss for guidance on the Five way
